COMMAND.NAME: findall
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Search for all occurrences text in a buffer

DESCRIPTION.P:
Attempt to locate all occurrences of the text contained in findbuffer in searchInBuffer
The following flags are available:
-backwardsearch backwards.
-wrapwraps the search or replace around the end of searchInBuffer
-regextreats findbuffer as a regular expression.
-ignorecaseignores case during the search.
-limitscopesearches only the selected text of searchInBuffer
NOTE: when limiting the search scope by the selected text of searchInBuffer the regular expression characters ^, and $ will match the ends of a selection segment.
